timeline.message: Issue #1038: "Serverless" Cloud Pipeline API - serviceUrl retrieving fixed, fix for host and port

timeline.bodyText: We also need to add these new properties to deploy/docker/cp-api-srv/config/application.properties
timeline.author: mzueva
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -159,4 +159,8 @@ log.security.elastic.index.prefix=${CP_SECURITY_LOGS_ELASTIC_PREFIX:security_log
 migration.alias.file=${CP_API_MIGRATION_ALIAS_FILE:}
 
 #Cache
-cache.type=MEMORY
\ No newline at end of file
+cache.type=MEMORY
+
+#edge
+edge.internal.host=${CP_EDGE_INTERNAL_HOST:cp-edge.default.svc.cluster.local}

timeline.message: Issue #1038: "Serverless" Cloud Pipeline API - new properties added to deploy properties file
